member.name: T:Orchid.Core.Clipboard
member.summary: Clipboard methods for core processes.

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.Clipboard.CopyTo(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Copy object to Clipboard. Can copy elements from a 1D list, but not from 2D..nD! If List Level is used, then will the last item be available in the clipboard.
member.param: element
member.returns: Add a watch node to verify the output

Data object to wait for

member.name: T:Orchid.Core.Directory
member.summary: Directory methods for core processes

member.name: P:Orchid.Core.Directory.Current
member.summary: Get current directory

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.Directory.FromPath(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a directory object from a path
member.param: Path to the directory

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.Directory.Contents(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the files in a directory and its subdirectories. Use string for extension type, default is * for all files! If files are are readonly but not hidden, are they included. If files are both hidden or readonly files (and thereby system files) are they left out.
member.param: Directory to get contents from
Search string used to filter results
Search option used to search in all subfolders

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.File.FromPath(System.String)
member.summary: Get file from a path
member.param: Path to the file

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.File.Rename(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Rename file
member.param: The directory path as string
The file extension
The name of the source file
The name of the target file

member.name: T:Orchid.Core.List
member.summary: List methods for core processes

members.member: Search values, send default if values not exist

member.summary: Clean nD list

Item(s) to search for

member.summary: Replace item in nD list

Item(s) to search for
Replacement value

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.List.Sort(System.Collections.IList,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sort elements using the PC 'locale'. Sort elements recursively preserving elements types and elements structure.
member.param: List of values
Return the list in descending order?

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.List.SortNatural(System.Collections.IList,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sort elements using the PC 'locale'. Sort elements recursively preserving elements types and elements structure.Sort elements in natural sort order by splitting digits from string and add leading zeros. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_sort_order
member.param: list of values
Return the list in descending order?

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.List.SortGroupByKey(System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Sort and group items into sub-lists based on their like key values
member.param: List of items to group as sublists
Key values, one per item in the input list, used for grouping the items
Sorted unique keys, used for grouping the items by their key
member.returns: list of sublists, with items grouped by like key values
key value corresponding to each group

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.List.IndexOf(System.Collections.IList,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the index (the full path) of the member in nD list
member.param: list of values
Element

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.List.GetItemAtIndex(System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Get an item from the given list that's located at the specified index (the full path) in nD list
member.param: list to fetch an item from
index of the item to be fetched
member.returns: item in the list at the given index

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.List.ReplaceItemAtIndex(System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.IList,System.Object)
member.summary: Replace an item from the given list that's located at the specified index (the full path) in nD list
member.param: list to replace an item in
index of the item to be replaced
the item to insert

member.summary: Filter two list items based on common key values

Keys from list 1
Items from list 2
Keys from list 2

Key values, one per item in the input list, used for grouping the items

member.name: M:Orchid.Core.String.Substring(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a substring from the given string. The substring starts at the given start string/character position and ends at the given string/character

Substring to search the start for
Substring to search the end for
Whether or not comparison takes case into account
